channel.title: Portforwarding, easyst and safest way (with pictures)!
channel.description:
Hello, i made this topic because everyday i see topics asking how to portforward. Well here is an easy way:
First, go to www.portforward.com/, and download PFConfig.
PFConfig is a program that automatilicy portforwards for you.
After you downloaded and starter it, you will see this screen:
[URL=http://img32.imageshack.us/i/naamloosem.png/][IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/2122/naamloosem.png[/img][/URL]
Select your router. After you did that, it asks you for the router name or password. If you don't know the name and/or password, most of the times they are like these 2:
name: admin password: (nothing)
name: admin password: admin
after u did that, press ok.
Now click on custom applications.
U will see this screen:
[URL=http://img203.imageshack.us/i/naamloosbu.png/][IMG]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/1622/naamloosbu.png[/img][/URL]
Now, press new. U will see this:
[URL=http://img85.imageshack.us/i/naamloosrr.png/][IMG]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/6056/naamloosrr.th.png[/img][/URL]
Enter a desired name.
If u press next, you will see this:
[URL=http://img341.imageshack.us/i/naamloosbj.png/][IMG]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/4446/naamloosbj.png[/img][/URL]
Enter in both textboxes 43594, the port of Runescape Private Servers.
Then press finish, then press update router.
Done!!
Hope i helped!!

Hello, i made this topic because everyday i see topics asking how to portforward. Well here is an easy way:

First, go to www.portforward.com/, and download PFConfig.

PFConfig is a program that automatilicy portforwards for you.

After you downloaded and starter it, you will see this screen:

Select your router. After you did that, it asks you for the router name or password. If you don’t know the name and/or password, most of the times they are like these 2:

name: admin
password: (nothing)

name: admin
password: admin

after u did that, press ok.

Now click on custom applications.

U will see this screen:

Now, press new. U will see this:

Enter a desired name.

If u press next, you will see this:

Enter in both textboxes 43594, the port of Runescape Private Servers.

Then press finish, then press update router.
